title: Shop By Store
cleaned_text: It's easy to help your dog stay clean and healthy, naturally, with Burt's Bees® dog shampoo, conditioner, waterless dog spray, hypoallergenic wipes, soothing salves and more. Designed specifically for their unique needs, Burt's Bees pet care products feature nourishing avocado oil, honey, soothing chamomile, rosemary and other natural ingredients to help you gently cleanse and care for your dog. Of course, Burt's Bees puppy shampoo and other pet care products are pH balanced for dogs, contain no colorants, sulfates, or added fragrances - and are always cruelty free. Whether you're looking for at-home grooming products or a simple pack of dog wipes to keep your pup clean on the go, shop PetSmart's selection of Burt's Bees for dogs and find your next favorite product! At PetSmart, you'll find products made by Burt's Bees for dogs that are formulated for specific health considerations, such as: - Hot Spots - Itch Relief - Hypoallergenic - Sensitive Skin - Shed Control You can shop our collection of Burt's Bees dog shampoo and other Burt's Bees® products in-store or online. Need to stock up on other [dog supplies](https://www.petsmart.com/dog/)? PetSmart carries many different brands of [grooming supplies](https://www.petsmart.com/dog/grooming-supplies/) for dogs and puppies, including [ear and eye care](https://www.petsmart.com/dog/grooming-supplies/eye-and-ear-care/) for dogs, dog grooming [clippers files](https://www.petsmart.com/dog/grooming-supplies/nail-clippers-and-files/), and [shampoos PetSmart convenient shopping with [ curbside](https://www.petsmart.com/help/your-order-H0003c.html) or [ in-store pickup](https://www.petsmart.com/help/your-order-H0003c.html). Need something today? We have select items available for [ same-day delivery](https://www.petsmart.com/help/your-order-H0003e.html) in most areas powered by DoorDash. For items you purchase frequently, PetSmart has [ Autoship](https://www.petsmart.com/help/your-order-H0003d.html) that automatically delivers the items you want to your door as often as you'd like. Check the website to see what items are eligible.
